questions.question: How do you connect your standalone VR headset to Wi-Fi?

answers.a: Use the companion app on your smartphone to connect.
answers.b: Follow the on-screen instructions in the headset to connect to Wi-Fi.
answers.c: Plug the headset into your PC to configure the connection.

questions.question: What should you do to set up a play area for room-scale VR?

answers.a: Clear the area of obstacles and use the controllers to define a boundary.
answers.b: Sit down and let the headset automatically create a boundary.
answers.c: Walk around the room until the headset maps it for you.

questions.question: How do you pair your VR controllers with the headset?

answers.a: Turn on the controllers, and they will pair automatically or follow pairing instructions.
answers.b: Plug the controllers into the headset using a USB cable.
answers.c: Download a separate app to pair the controllers.
